linkedin_post.name: LinkedIn Post
linkedin_post.description: Aimed at professionals, thought leaders, and businesses. Content is typically career-focused or industry-related, designed to spark engagement among people seeking professional growth, networking, or knowledge.
linkedin_post.ideal_audience: Business professionals, marketers, entrepreneurs, recruiters, job seekers, industry experts

whatsapp_message.name: WhatsApp Message
whatsapp_message.description: Casual or semi-formal communication meant for direct, personal messaging. Used for sending quick updates, reminders, or messages to small groups, often informal in tone.
whatsapp_message.ideal_audience: Friends, family, small teams, personal contacts, colleagues in a more relaxed setting

tweet.name: Tweet
tweet.description: Aimed at a broad, diverse audience on Twitter, from the general public to niche communities. Tweets are brief and designed to provoke quick engagement, whether through likes, retweets, or comments.
tweet.ideal_audience: General public, influencers, content creators, tech enthusiasts, trend followers, entertainment fans

news_article.name: News Article
news_article.description: Targeted at a wide audience seeking timely, relevant information. News articles are often written for readers who are looking for the latest updates, in-depth analysis, or expert opinions on current events or trending topics.
news_article.ideal_audience: General public, journalists, news enthusiasts, academics, policy makers, professionals interested in current affairs

technical_blog.name: Technical Blog
technical_blog.description: Aimed at professionals, experts, or hobbyists in specialized fields like technology, software development, engineering, or data science. The content is typically in-depth, offering insights, tutorials, and technical knowledge.
technical_blog.ideal_audience: Software developers, engineers, data scientists, tech entrepreneurs, IT professionals, learners seeking advanced technical skills

formal_email.name: Formal Email
formal_email.description: Designed for business or professional communication. The email is meant for communicating with colleagues, clients, business partners, or supervisors in a polite, respectful, and formal tone.
formal_email.ideal_audience: Business professionals, corporate partners, clients, managers, senior leadership, job candidates

instagram_post.name: Instagram Post
instagram_post.description: Aimed at a visually-driven, creative audience. Instagram posts are often used for branding, lifestyle content, promotions, or personal expression, with a focus on imagery and concise captions.
instagram_post.ideal_audience: Millennials, Gen Z, influencers, lifestyle bloggers, fashion enthusiasts, foodies, beauty influencers, brand followers

website_content.name: Website Content
website_content.description: Targeted at a broad range of users, from potential customers to casual visitors. Website content needs to be informative, engaging, and easily navigable, with a focus on conversion and user experience.
website_content.ideal_audience: Consumers, visitors, potential customers, search engine users, anyone looking for information or services

marketing_email.name: Marketing Email
marketing_email.description: Aimed at potential customers or existing leads. Marketing emails are designed to drive action, whether it’s to purchase a product, sign up for a service, or engage with a special offer.
marketing_email.ideal_audience: Prospective customers, leads, subscribers, clients, consumers interested in sales promotions

job_application.name: Job Application
job_application.description: Directed towards hiring managers, recruiters, or HR professionals. The job application content should clearly convey qualifications, skills, and the applicant's interest in a specific role.
job_application.ideal_audience: Recruiters, hiring managers, HR professionals, employers, staffing agencies

customer_support_response.name: Customer Support Response
customer_support_response.description: Meant for existing or potential customers seeking assistance with a product or service. The tone should be empathetic, understanding, and solution-oriented, addressing the customer’s issue in a clear, helpful manner.
customer_support_response.ideal_audience: Customers with inquiries, complaints, technical issues, or service requests
